text.section: Before the State makes any funds available for an approved project, the Office shall cause a notice of the State's right of recovery to be recorded in the land records of the county in which the property is located.

The recording of the notice:
does not create a lien against the property; but
constitutes notice to any potential transferee, transferor, creditor, or any other interested party of the possibility that the State may obtain a lien under this subtitle.
